website_summaries.verdict: The Clip 3 puts the “portable” in “portable speaker” with its ultra-light design, but its great sound quality and rugged form make it an excellent choice for daily use.
cons: Although the Clip 3 easily connects to all Bluetooth devices, you cannot control this portable speaker via an official JBL app

customer_reviews.title: Love it but clip is loose.
customer_reviews.text: I was planning on giving this 5 stars, but after about a week of use the clip doesn’t close completely any more. I usually have it clipped on my bag or cooler tote and love how light weight and portable it is, and it has great sound quality. With how fast the clip loosened I’m nervous it will continue to over time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly muckell

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound, Small Package
customer_reviews.text: For years, I would carry a large portable radio to the Volleyball Court on the beach. It was heavy and took up a lot of room. Last year, I switched to a small bluetooth speaker, but it didn't have the power I needed, and the battery crapped out after about two hours. THIS year, I bought the Clip 3, with 1000 mAh, and had it cranked on high for over three hours. Great sound out of such a small package and it clips right to the bottom of the net or a beach umbrella. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Portable, clear-sounding with the clip making it one of the most convenient speakers
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good and battery lasts long enough for me. Super portable, I can hook it to a belt loop and walk with it. Bass is acceptable considering it's low power consumption. Outdoors it's not great but inside it's great and a great shower speaker if you can find a place to hook it.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: My new best little buddy.
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker goes with me everywhere. It’s small enough to fit in my purse or backpack. The sound is exceptionally good for how small it is. The blue tooth connectivity is flawless. And it’s water proof! I love using it all the time, everyday and everywhere. It’s my new best little friend. And although I have three other blue tooth speakers (one an Aiwa boombox, the other a Sony and a Boss small box speaker) I use this JBL more than my other ones. It’s just so portable.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad At All
customer_reviews.text: It has tremendous battery life, looks great, connects fast and far, and does it's job. The sound is pretty acceptable as well. Nothing that will leave you astonished but for around 30 dollars it is hard to complain. I will say on full volume the music can tend to have a harsh bass and general sound to it, but it's not awful.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, portable, good sound
customer_reviews.text: Has decent bass for a speaker of this size but missing some of the highs I feel. Clip seems study, same for overall build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Horrse

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Love the speaker. Sounds great and is incredibly portable. Waterproof aspects held up to the test on my paddle board at the lake. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: APK

customer_reviews.title: Very poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this purchase. I bought this portable speaker to play music while riding my bicycle. It performed well for about a week - good sound reproduction and healthy battery. BUT, after hitting a few bumps, the front cover fell off. (see photos) It will not go back on, so the speaker is no longer water proof. Also, it is vulnerable to dirt and street grease. If I can't get the front fixed back on, I fear this was wasted money. Alas, the following week the arm broke off and I can't use the clip to hold it on my bike. Terrible waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Tony L

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Waste Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend purchasing this product: The JBL Clip 3 Portable Waterproof Wireless Bluetooth Speaker - Camo. It worked fine for 2 months. After that the battery appears to have failed, and just my luck, it was 3 days outside the return window so the seller, Power Match, refuses to replace it. So much for customer service! What a waste of money. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: India

customer_reviews.title: CLIP IS AWFUL!!! Speaker sound is great
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is great. Going on number 3 in 2 months because the clip keeps breaking after just a couple uses. The pin keeps falling off. This last one missed the Amazon warranty by a day and it’s going to be over a month before the company replaces it. It takes about an hour to go through the approval process to have this speaker sent back to the company and then they have to receive it & check it over before they’ll send you a new:( Very Disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this early December as a Christmas present for my boyfriend. It’s now mid February and the cover has come off. We were just going to glue it back on. We hadn’t got that far so my boyfriend was carrying it in his front hoodie pocket so he wouldn’t lose the cover, he pulled out of his pocket and the clips had now broken off too. Just poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Graulty

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed product
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward for it to arrive and boy was I disappointed. The sound is very weak Very flat sound Bad/weak BT connectivity the clip too small for most things Colors are nice but other than that the worst JBL item I came across Returning it sadly
customer_reviews.author: Eldan Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Had for two weeks and the clip is already broken
customer_reviews.text: The main selling point of the clip is...to be able to clip it. After two weeks of use, the carabiner is already broken. The design prevents you from replacing this piece. For a product that is promoted as suitable for outdoor use, this lack of durability is disappointing to say the least. On top of that, I had already recycled the packaging, so I'm stuck as far as a return goes. For this price, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: JCurran

customer_reviews.title: Portability is key
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to listen to at work. I am in the Plumbing field so I knew it would take quite a beating. I use it at work almost everyday. It is lightweight and fits anywhere. I usually clip it to my belt loop and walk around working. The loudness is spot on. I rarely have to charge it. (once every week) I use it for around 5 hours per day. One thing on every speaker that sucks is the microphone. I wouldn't use it for anything. I have used this speaker sailing, working, hiking. Pretty much anywhere you can think of. Would definitively buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker but the face of it fell off after a week
customer_reviews.author: Wesley J Schlegel

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and portability
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was surprisingly good. I bought this to use in the operating room since it’s portable and lightweight enough. I haven’t tested the battery life to its limit though but it is good enough for a 3-hour non-stop play. I would’ve preferred a dark green color but this shade is as close as I could get. A little tweak maybe on the design of the USB port, I wish the cover of the port can twist while being charged so that the plug is not in the way. I have this feeling that after heavy use it would eventually break the silicone/plastic cover. Overall highly recommended for the sound quality, portability and price.
customer_reviews.author: HAZEL

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This product was fulfilled by Amazon. I can't figure out how to contact them about my problem. The speaker worked fine between May 21 and August 22. Now it won't pair with my iPod, it won't charge and the indicator light is solid red without being charged. Of all the bluetooth devices I've owned - this lasted the shortest period of time.
customer_reviews.author: frHI2WA

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could have returned this but I didn’t use it right away. The speaker disconnects from my phone every 30 minutes or so and turns off. Also, battery life lasts about 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Flesher

customer_reviews.title: JBL Clip 3
customer_reviews.text: My Clip 3 speaker did not function unless it was plugged in. It would not fully charge and I could not see the red light. If I disconnected speaker from USB, it would completely turn off. I paid more than $50 for this product thinking it would be worth it. I have attempted to reset and look at YouTube videos to try and solve the issue but to no avail. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Janie A.

customer_reviews.title: One fatal flaw in design/production
customer_reviews.text: The one star is for the carabiner clip. The pin that holds the arm and spring in place is poorly made. I bought 2 of these and they both broke at the exact same pivot point within a week of each other and less than 2 months of ownership. The sound, the speaker the portability are all amazing and there is no regrets of going with JBL, but this is a weak problem that oils easily be solved.
customer_reviews.author: David A Paz

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, defective
customer_reviews.text: First day of use and it disconnected 7 times for no reason. Better spend more money and invest in a better quality product available on a market
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is great. We take it everywhere. The sound quality is really nice, and the volume gets pretty loud! We haven't tested it's true waterproof-ness yet, but overall, it's been a good product.
customer_reviews.author: KerraH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shower speakers!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this attached behind my shower head using a velcro strap. I have been listening every day when I shower (10-15 mins). A single charge will last you a month, easily. Bass is not excellent, but that is to be expected with small speakers. I already have JBL extreme 2 but the shower noises overwhelm the music if you place the speakers outside the shower. Now, with this waterproof speaker right above my head in the shower, I can jam along to my favorite songs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart Easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to listen to music while i'm at work. I bought because i have the 2nd edition of the clip and it still works with all the pieces attached.only reason i got new one the battery doesn't last as long as it use to. The clip 3 speaker the clip on it broke and the the front cover fell off. I just clip it to my waist and when i'm working i clip it on to some thing else so there should be no reason for it to fall apart like it did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this little guy!
customer_reviews.text: This gets almost daily use around my house. I have a UE Boom 2 speaker that we usually keep in our living room, but it's really nice to have something designed to be carried around addition to that. We use the Clip by attaching it to jeans belt loops while walking around parks, clipping it to our shower curtain rod (highly recommend), and setting it in the backyard. It would be absolutely perfect for camping/hiking too. Battery life lasts quite a while and the sound quality is great. Used it in the shower tons of times and never had any issues. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wachter

customer_reviews.title: The speaker is called "Clip" but the clip broke
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for 2.5 months and used it 2-3 times per week. Similar to how you might see it used in HBO shows like High Maintenance or Betty, I clipped this speaker onto a bag while I bicycled. The pin holding the clip mechanism in place loosened a few times and I pushed it back into place. It finally must've fallen out. Poor construction and poor durability. I guess I'll just duct tape it shut and use a real carabiner. If you have any sort of active lifestyle where the clip would be truly useful, I can't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: Clip is not durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker due to the waterproof and durability aspects it claims to offer. I took the speaker on my first river float of the year, clipped it to my cooler (that was secured into a tube), and the clip broke off on the two-hour float and was lost in the river. This is a $50 portable speaker, pricier than most, so I expected a lot better quality than what I received. I contacted JBL directly to explain what had happened, and unfortunately, their customer service did not result in making things right with a customer. I will not be purchasing another one of these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: WO

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly crappy for JBL Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Battery life was problematic. Fully charged over night and then it would die within two hours of play. Charging chord is so short it's laughable. It's a little guy, guess I should have figured based on price but I like the portability. Carabiner doesn't fall off like other portable speakers since it's part of this speaker. Not durable though. The cover flew off while I was riding my bike and I have no idea where it disappeared to. Lasted just over one month. Quite disappointed. I have the big boom box and am happy with that product.
customer_reviews.author: Burris

customer_reviews.title: Solid audio but extremely disappointing battery life
customer_reviews.text: This audio quality exceeded my expectations by quite a bit. The maximum volume is a lot higher than I anticipated. It gets some decent bass, but I doubt anyone is buying this as an audiophile. The clip is pretty sturdy too. Clipped it to my belt loop at work and had no problems. However the battery lasted just about 2 hours. Would easily be 4 stars if it lasted even half of what they claim.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Eiche

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the bathroom/shower
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a bathroom speaker to use when I’m brushing my teeth with an electric toothbrush and when I’m showering. I’m only using it for 2-minute/20-minute bursts, so the battery lasts FOREVER. I’ve never even made it to max volume for this purpose. I clipped it to my shower caddy and it only receives indirect water. I wanted something that looked sleek and had the ability to be easily portable on walks/hikes or hotel rooms. The only downside is the sound it makes when you turn it on and off... it’s an obnoxious (short) guitar riff. It’s cool, I guess, but I’d rather hear a single-tone beep or just see an LED to signal it’s on/off.
customer_reviews.author: skullface

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality, small hook
customer_reviews.text: Battery life has proven substantially better than claimed in the description. This speaker also shows no signs of water infiltration after a little over a month suspended from my shower head. The controls are easy to manipulate with wet hands and the auto-off timer seems well chosen. Note, the carabiner style hook is rather small, opening is around 1". The hook is made from sturdy aluminum, but the hinge of the hook is flimsy. I wouldn't expect it to last long if you clip and unclip it often. The speaker is also heavier than I expected. Probably due to good speaker components, which suits my uses well, but might be undesirable if you're carrying it around a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Woods

customer_reviews.title: great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought seven of these to give to family this Christmas. The sound is very good for such a little speaker. I debated between this and the Sony extra base but chose this due to the heavy duty clip. My kids with mostly use this for outdoors, hiking , etc so the clip and seemed a bit more secure. My kids love these and the sound quality. Great speaker for the price. I am a big fan of JBL and these have lived up to the reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: You’ll be so surprised at how great this is
customer_reviews.text: Guys, I had the 1st gen of this and it lasted 7 years!!!! I was so excited to buy this one. I’ve used it at the pool 5 times and not only have I not charged it since it arrived, the battery still reads 100%... after like 5 30 minute uses. It’s so convenient and lovely. It cost twice as much as the last one but it’s just worth it. Comment regarding seller. Item was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Casperson

customer_reviews.title: Questionable...
customer_reviews.text: This item has great sound, easy to use, easy to carry, but the WARNING is very concerning. The "warning ⚠" says may cause Cancer ♋. Also in the description of the item it states that it's water proof, but the reading on the boxed item states not to get wet, not to take outside, not to submerge in water. I do understand why they had to state "not to submerge in water", because some people will try to test things that shouldn't be tested. But it's concerning to me, because it's supposed to be able to hook on the 🚿 head. I bought 3 different designs and now I'm thinking about sending all 3 back.
customer_reviews.author: terrie

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be a good speaker. I’ve owned multiple brands including Bose, Skullcandy, and now JBL. If this speaker were $20, it would be a great value. At $30, ok. For what I paid for this speaker, compared to others on the market, I’m thoroughly disappointed. At 75% volume it distorts. At full volume, it’s not loud and also sounds terrible. I’m not saying it’s completely terrible, but I should have only spent $20. Now I’m back on Amazon looking for another speaker. I feel like I paid $20 for the speaker and $50 for the JBL tag. Not cool JBL. Please do better.
customer_reviews.author: Hello5353

customer_reviews.title: Clip and Gate are Weak
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first real time today. Clipped the device to my backpack and went for a 3 mile bicycle ride. After stopping, saw the gate of the clip had completely busted off! The sound is good for the size but I haven’t even tested the battery yet. Pretty perturbed with the flimsiness of the gate and clip. Are we supposed to clip it to something and stay stationary??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mini boom box
customer_reviews.text: I had the clip 2!! This is definitely an upgrade sound is loud loud loud an clear battery life is absolutely amazing!! It’s like boom box!! And it came in yellow!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Superior sound quality in a little speaker
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality, bass, and volume of this little speaker is AMAZING! I wear and clip the speaker to my belt loop at work when I want to listen to upbeat music. On a full charge, the battery life lasts at least eight hours of continuous music play. I also use it in my vehicle when I want to listen to playlists, podcasts, and audiobooks saved on my phone. The speaker's excellent sound quality allow me to hear songs, audiobooks, and podcasts with clarity even when the windows are rolled down in my vehicle. Overall, the speaker is durable, portable, and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tisa

customer_reviews.title: Luv this thing.
customer_reviews.text: First off this speaker has some weight to it. Has a metal case as well as a metal hook. The hook opens and closes. Has a rubber protective back. I use this in a front end loader that has no radio. I hook it to the window clamp and sink it up to my phone. When you turn on/off the speaker it makes a sound to let you know. Once sinked with your phone, you never have to worry about it again. Once you turn it on, it sinks to your phone. The sound is good for such a small speaker. I can hear it fine. all and all really good durable speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Swazzie

customer_reviews.title: It's not a cheap portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: Hook is nice, wish it was a little wider opening, though. Color isn't exactly red, more red-ish in person. Last generation was true red so I had high expectations on a color match. Speaker isn't going to blow your hair back, but it isn't cheap quality either. What makes it a worth-wile purchase is the portability. Plus, it is weather resistant. I can leave it outside without issue. What I wish it had was wireless charging so it could use the same charging pad as my phone rather than having to find a cable (not included) to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Broke and wouldn’t get replaced
customer_reviews.text: Broke after the second use! The front mesh face popped clean off, exposing the delicate speakers inside, and JBL refused to replace it despite it being brand new. Really disappointing product and company.
customer_reviews.author: graham

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, great portability and battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who loves to hike. I wasn't comfortable with him wearing headphones while hiking so he clips this on his backpack and gets to rock Primus and the trails at the same time. It sounds good on all types of music, great for the size actually. Decent bass response and clarity. The battery life and portability are great. I love JBL, Harman gear in general is great. I highly recommend this and I don't give 5 stars often.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZADDICT

customer_reviews.title: Easily Broken, but good product in sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing, my daughter dropped it once and it broke. Slipped off the table onto a wooden floor and it broke. I was surprised at the durability. While it was my fault it fell, it would be nice to have piece of mind it can take some wear and tear. Especially since its on a clip and prone to possibly bang up against something. The sound quality was great and it was easy to charge.
customer_reviews.author: A.Ross

customer_reviews.title: Yes please!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I bought this speaker to replace a $10 one I had for years- and it's been awesome. I clip it to my kitchen cabinet handles to keep it away (and easy to find) while spending time cooking and cleaning, and I also clip it to my beach chair when I'm at the lake, and I can put it high up in my greenhouse. The clip is absolutely necessary and I love it- it's not flimsy and feels very secure. My only con- this girl needs more bass and it doesn't bump as much as I'd prefer. Unless you can adjust that and I just don't know How! Overall. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: the informer

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Sound, and Ease of Use!!!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I purchased this bluetooth speaker is due to my daughter. We celebrated Memorial Day at out place on the lake. My daughter retrieved the speaker from her bag & connected (bluetooth) it to her cell phone. I was completely amazed at the sound quality and battery life. So, after a brief AMAZON search, I found it and as a Prime Member, it was here in 3 days. I love the sound quality and the color I purchased as red. I suggest this portable speaker to everyone! There is no need to have a BOOM Box any longer!
customer_reviews.author: Tiyo4ever

customer_reviews.title: Great for bike riding
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a high-quality but small speaker I could take with me on bike rides. This thing is small enough that I can clip it to just about anything, and it does a great job of pumping out high-quality audio that can keep up with busy street traffic noise. When I get off the major streets and into the quiet neighborhoods, I've got to turn it down because it sounds too dang loud! Incredible for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Hlavacek

customer_reviews.title: Easy and portable, lack luster sound.
customer_reviews.text: Cons:The sound quality is decent, but lacking base and fine tuning options. Product is loud but the quality is not where you would use this product to listen as a sole activity. Sound quality is not something for an audiophile, and I am not one. Pros: Portability is excellent, fairly light, and the carabiner style clip is awesome for clipping on your bag for a bike ride. Water resistance makes this an ideal piece to bring to the beach or lake. While i don’t love the audio quality, the product itself is quality. This is perfect for doing activities, or for using while hangin amd talkin with your friends.
customer_reviews.author: Wheels

customer_reviews.title: Better for music than podcasts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to listen to podcasts in the morning while I get ready. Because they have apparently done everything can possibly can to squeeze bass out of such a tiny speaker, it makes the voices sound boomy and sometimes hard to hear clearly — the speaker really emphasizes the low-end at the expense of the mid-range which is critical for spoken word. So for podcasts, I don't think this is a great choice. For music, it is of course far from what you'd call "accurate" but it sounds acceptable for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Harding

customer_reviews.title: Incredible battery life in a nice overall package
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this for a shower speaker, and it's perfect in that role. The sound quality is solidly "okay," which is all I need since I'm usually listening to podcasts, news, or audio books. The battery life is phenomenal. I have to charge it about one every few months. I can't overstate how impressed I am with its longevity. It connects easily, is water resistant, sounds fine, is portable for when I take it camping, and the battery lasts so long I have to hunt for the charging port every time. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Sherrouse

customer_reviews.title: Portable, lightweight, good sound!
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, it just didn’t measure up the hype it had. It’s not as loud as I thought it’d be and the battery life isn’t too long if you put it on full volume, I do have to charge it within 12 hours of use on full BUT on the positive note, I love it’s portability. I love that’s it’s waterproof and I can take it with me in the shower. The sound QUALITY is good, through it I hear the treble much crisper than through my phone or computer and so it’s good for me at the moment but I do plan on splurging on something louder in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia M.

customer_reviews.title: Packs a Punch
customer_reviews.text: For a palm-sized device, this speaker has great quality and volume sound. My teenage son loves it. Initially I bought for him so he can stop taking his phone in the shower, he now carry’s this speaker everywhere. It is indeed waterproof and made durably. It looks pretty cool as well. I really like the clip which many portable speakers do not have. I’m not sure of exact battery life, but I do know it will play for several hours before needing a recharge. Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: amykellyp

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for throwing in your cycling jersey when on group rides so there is music but people also have their ears free. Great for the shower. Heck, I use this speaker more than I thought I would. It's clear and crisp. A lot louder than you would expect from a smaller speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it's the actuall size u want!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love he product just that i thoughtbit would be smaller its actually bigger jn person than advertised. But it plays music's clean ..I haven't tested tje battery life but i can tell it lasts long so far since I received it I am playing music and it plays even though I havent have charged it yet.. aAm disappointed in the packaging the box was too excess cause me more money to clear the item because of the ridiculous big box for a small package!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna George

customer_reviews.title: Amazing like all jBl products!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy Jbl products more than others because of sound quality and value for said quality. So compared to a Jbl Flip it doesn't sound as good but it sounds good enough to have on your hip as you work, which is why I bought it. Its volume controls your phone volume which is nice. The clip is sturdy. It has pretty good range but u don't see why you'd be far away with a portable speaker. Overall a great purchase 👍
customer_reviews.author: hoboman2

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement over my previous bluetooth speaker in sound, range, volume
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use mine on the walking trail. The hook is very handy so I can carry it around my neck. It's lightweight enough, sound quality is notably better and louder. I have not really tested the battery life yet as the longest I've used it continuously is 2 hours. Seems to recharge quickly. Range is much better. I guess you get what you pay for. $50 vs about $15-23 for my old unit: X-Mini KAI XAM11-B Bluetooth Portable Capsule Speaker, Black
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, light weight, good battery life
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd JBL clip, so I've had the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd versions of them. I love them. This one is by far the prettiest and has long battery life. The earlier ones got to the point where they would no longer hold a charge but had to be plugged in all the time. But they lasted through hours of use before that happened. I don't think you can beat this for a portable battery with good sound, water resistance and battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I am so surprised at the durability of this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good but I don't know what I'm talking about when it comes to that. The thing that surprised me about this was the durability. I left this speaker on top of my car and drove around for about a week thinking that something was wrong with my car because I kept hearing a banging sound near the back of the car. The speaker was stashed in my roof rack and it had been raining all week but it still turned on a worked perfectly. This was months ago and it still works great, I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Kranz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE these speakers!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING sound, so so loud for its size. Great size for portability! Love that I can clip it to my pants, purse, book sack, beach chair, etc! Would make a great gift for someone who loves music but may want to take this hiking, to a skate park, walking, etc. Also great for listening to podcasts at work or home. overall 10/10 for what it is intended to be. The clipping part could be the only thing that may wear down in the long run, but other than that, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: MDecker

customer_reviews.title: Small and Powerful (Sound TEST in video)
customer_reviews.text: SKIP TO 0:34 on video FOR SOUND TEST great product, this little speaker packs a lot of power and is comfortable on the hands. It is light and stylish. I am using it to go camping trips or small get together with friends. I bought it because i usually like to play music when im with friends. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great for the car, etc
customer_reviews.text: Since my input for my car speakers broke, that I could use to play my phone through, this has been a great alternative. It clips on my purse handle very nicely. Have not yet run the battery entirely down. It's fine for music, and podcasts are great too. It can stay connected from one end of my house, to the other, which is also good. I got the aqua, which perfectly matches my purse, so I am quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: esporter

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying cheaper Blutooth speakers because of budget issues, but I splurged for this one on Prime day (ended up being about $40) and it has been well worth it! Battery life is awesome - no issue for 8-10 hours that I've been using it continuously. The volume gets loud enough that you can hear music and podcasts over the task at hand. The sound quality it better than I thought.. not as tinny as some of the other portable speakers. Overall, it was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brian McElwaine

customer_reviews.title: Good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Am really liking this; I had to return a Sonos speaker recently because after 2 hours and dealing with two different customer service people, I couldn't get it to connect to my wifi. I wanted to use this speaker in my bathroom and living room until I found a better wifi speaker option (if that exists. If anyone has suggestions please let me know). Sound is really good and the only negative is that it sucks the battery on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Clip bent beyond repair
customer_reviews.text: I clipped this on to my backpack while riding my bike for 30 minutes yesterday and when I got home the clip was crooked and the clip is cracking. I bought this speaker 2 months ago and now it’s biggest asset it broken. I’m pissed at the flimsy quality and would like a refund. I loved this speaker so much until this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for teens
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these speaker for my teenage children. They were both very pleased when the opened them. These little speakers can put out quality sound that you would not believe. These speakers have both been in use for over six months and we have not had any problems with them. The clip is a great feature if you are outside. We clip ours to the trees or even the patio umbrella arms so we can listen outside.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D'Amore

customer_reviews.title: Be aware the charging port keeps failing.
customer_reviews.text: I have had three of these, same problem. The USB connector to charge the battery fails. This time in three months. But then with Covid 19 it was impossible to speak to customer care ( it was shut). By June the Amazon warranty expired. I call last week and sent my last clip back to Harmon. I think I will receive another, but not new. I am now looking at Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Travel or go to the beach, it’s waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: This the best Bluetooth speaker you can get! Went on a trip and it was awesome! No batteries to change because it comes with a rechargeable battery built in, that works with any usb plug you have laying around. Great sound with a deep bass, even if you think it might be too small to have a good bass. Play music all day without recharging, well, we charged it when we went to bed to have it ready again the next day. But it truly lasted all day! You won’t regret it, we’re very happy with ours.
customer_reviews.author: V. Moniz

customer_reviews.title: convenient and portable
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine yesterday so I don't know yet the extent of durability and battery life. I plan to bring it with me at work. I intend to put it on my belt so I can walk around with it. I work in a lab and cannot always fiddle with the speaker and volume control therefore, it will be set volume while working. The size is convenient to move around but it has a little more weight if you'll put it on your belt or pants loop. It looks sturdy enough. The sound is good but not a lot of base.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Has A Fuller Sound Than You Might Expect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She told me that she used it to provide music for a social gathering and that several people commented to her that both the volume and sound quality were surprisingly good. She had asked for one that was a bit smaller, but she told me that she was glad that she ended up with this one because it's much better than the small one her friend has which I couldn't get shipped quickly. She's super pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Butler

customer_reviews.title: The clip is not very durable.  Broke within three months
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty gentle with this thing, but the clip broke just outside of my return window. JBL's customer support is basically non-existent: the phone system disconnected me before I could speak to an agent. All I need is a simple pin to get the clip back and running, but I'm beginning to question if it's even worth it. The sound quality was not as robust as I was hoping. I get better sound out of my older and cheaper Sony bluetooth speaker. I might just jury-rig a clip to it and use it as my new go-to.
customer_reviews.author: A-Ron

customer_reviews.title: Struggles to connect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would be a good bathroom speaker for my iPhone. 9/10 times it won't connect to my Bluetooth on my phone. I've tried charging it, standing next to it, etc... Very frustrating. Do not buy this product. Not reliable and more hassle than it's worth. Mine is in the trash and I'm searching for a better speaker option. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Soren Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Big sound little speaker
customer_reviews.text: The face plate fell off of my speaker. My friend has the same one on an early model and his had fallen off too. How about some beyter glue on this thing. I love this portable speaker it is everything I need in a clip it and go speaker. The volume is loud, the bass is incredible for the size. Everyone will be saying “ all that sound is coming from that” and they will. It’s water proof and sand proof. Great for the Bach, on the bike or wherever your going.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Present Ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband is one hard Guy to shop for, but this was a hit he loves ! Takes it camping, when we are out in the pool hangs it on screened porch , on vacation and even clips to his lunch box for work everyday.
customer_reviews.author: LisaLu

customer_reviews.title: Music is therapy. This speaker saves my sanity daily
customer_reviews.text: The best speaker ever!!!! EVER!!! I have had two of these. The first one was a gift from my dad! I gave it to my downstairs neighbors, and I saw that they updated the color to look more vintage so I ordered a new one. The sound quality is great. Literally the sh could hit the fan, and if I had this speaker everything would still be great. Music is therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, portability, battery life & waterproof!!
customer_reviews.text: We took one of these speakers with us on vacation in the Bahamas. We were there 11 days and didn’t charge it once. It survived the sand, ocean and pool! The sound came through loud enough to hear over a twin engine boat flying across the waves! I purchased two more of these speakers for home - one for the bathroom and one for our pool. I previously used a Bose soundlink color outside by our pool (which is much more expensive) and this little speaker is two times better. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Weak Battery
customer_reviews.text: The JBL puts out a great sound, but I was anticipating the battery last more 3 1/2 hours of continuous use. Originally I rated them five stars, but since I have had them for almost a year I had to down grade the star rating. I love that they are compact, gives out good sound and looks nice, but once the battery life is not long enough to support a long bike ride.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Small but loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clip on my backpack when I'm riding my bike, it's loud enough to hear my music through the sounds of the city. The only thing is I wish it had more bass but I get that maybe because of the size it is less and that's ok. So if you're looking for something mobile that's practical this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Grisel

customer_reviews.title: Speaker broken need help
customer_reviews.text: Hey I bought my speaker may 6 2019 and everything was perfect up until yesterday November 19 2019 I was playing it as usual and the speaker started sounding distorted and alot of static I really like the speaker so I'm wondering if I can get it sent in to be repaired or replaced please let me know I know speakers dont last forever but I expected more then 7 months also for anyone reading the speaker is great like the sound and portability gets alot of people asking where I got it
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Amazing battery life!
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is amazing on this! I used it on vacation at the beach and by the pool! The battery life seemed to last a day at the beach and a few hours by the pool! The Bluetooth is easy to connect and the clip on the top makes it portable almost anywhere. I have not yet tried to see how waterproof is. I did leave it out in a drizzle for about 5 minutes and everything works fine.
customer_reviews.author: mcr

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: When i first received my speaker it worked incredibly well. After about 2 weeks it stopped holding a charge and the battery life was completely shot. Bluetooth started having connection issues as well as the volume not being able to project a higher volume without shutting off. Not sure if there was a distributing/production issue, but i am waiting on a replacement Clip 3.
customer_reviews.author: Jrogers

customer_reviews.title: Definitely waterproof and portable
customer_reviews.text: We've had this speaker for a month and a half and have used it numerous times at the beach, the pool, our backyard and inside the home. Its strength is definitely being waterproof and portable. The sound is clear but it's not a very strong speaker. Only issue we've had is that it came with a messed up clip. It has given away several times, one time we we're lucky to fish it out of the water. I only wish the quality was there and I would give it a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: Speaker stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to use on my food truck on Aug. 19, 2019. It didn't even last a year when it suddenly stopped working. I have no idea how to fix it. Speaker quality is good and it sturdy. I'm not sure if it's really waterproof or not but wondered about the humidity on the truck. This is my 2nd speaker and they both died on me. I do like the sound, material, and size. I just wish it would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT fit on shower pipe.
customer_reviews.text: So this product really looks like it will fit over a shower pipe but it is way to small probably smaller then 1/2 inch. Also a big thumbs down on the sound. The bass response is sub par. I was expecting to be able to jamb out in the shower, now I just end up singing to myself.
customer_reviews.author: volksbugly

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker, don’t trust the clip
customer_reviews.text: The speaker itself worked very well (I really liked it). The biggest problem is the clip. Although it appears sturdy, mine broke while on my kayak (first time out/had just purchased it) by bumping it (not kicking it or hitting it hard), clip broke & the speaker hit the water & floated away (Current was too strong to go in the direction it went). I contacted JBL who said that since it was gone there was nothing they could do about it (which I disagree with but it’s not the fault of the customer support person). If you buy this, I would be cautious of using the clip to secure it if on the open water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, Not Great Sound Quality. Definitely Loud AF Though.
customer_reviews.text: Can confirm: It gets loud AF for something so small. The carabiner clip has been very reliable thus far. No reason to suspect any sort of failure there. The emphasis on loudness washes out some of the higher register though. Worked great for an impromptu speaker phone call with a group of friends. Overall pretty pleasant and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Marmar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound for a little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have had this speaker for a few weeks now and it is awesome! I have the JBL Charge 3, but I really wanted something for hikes and bike rides. When I saw the size and the fact that it had a carabiner, I was sold! I used this on 2 bike rides, 26 mile and 21 mile respectively without charging it in between. With the traffic and road noise, I had the speaker up pretty loud. The bass was great! I then proceeded to use it for another couple hours before it died. I am impressed. Also, the fact that it's waterproof....can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: nodoubtrox004

customer_reviews.title: No charger or cord, makes it worthless!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great but no charger so its worthless. If they cant enclose all the parts I would order from some one else! I will return to Amazon and findsome one else to buy from.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Sound good for price. Portable and waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is pretty good, but of course I wish it were a little bit better! The sound is not bad at all, but turned up high it's going to be a little bit meh. But that's fine for this price range and it's waterproof so duh. Love how easily portable it is. I keep one in my car because I can't connect to my car speakers using bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Clip only opens about 1/2 inch
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good but the clip doesn’t open as large as I need. I went back to the product description and it doesn’t tell you how far the clip opens. I wanted to hook this on my bike but the metal is thicker than 1/2 inch so I will need to find a Velcro’s strap to make this work for my needs. It looks like the clip only opens a hair over 1/2 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the size and portability
customer_reviews.text: I had a no name Bluetooth speaker that was slowly dieing and replaced it with this JBL speaker. The sound quality is an amazing upgrade, the Bluetooth connects quickly, the battery life is great. My only negative is that it doesn't really tell you when the battery is running out. Some sort of audio cue letting me know would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Okay speaker
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I really liked this speaker, it’s pretty loud for its size and has god sound quality. It has decent battery life that lasts about 5 hours. The clip is awesome because you can carry it with you while getting stuff done around the house. Cons: Ive had it for 6 months now and the front of the speaker keeps falling off for some reason (not sure if anyone else has had this issue) and it started shutting off while playing music even though it’s charged.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Cute color and concept, wish sound was better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is not as good as expected, it gets a bit staticky ones you get it to the louder volume settings. If not for that, I’d have given it 5 stars...kinda a big bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Westernmarie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker at work after seeing a manager use this same brand and it's very light, I've accidentally dropped it a couple times and it hasn't broken, the sound quality is excellent. Very clear and you can adjust the sound through your phone. I've had this speaker for several months and I definitely recommend it for anyone on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Farkas Hinecker

customer_reviews.title: Falls to pieces
customer_reviews.text: Will never purchase again. I had this at work, hanging with it clipped securely. The speaker fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Egbert

customer_reviews.title: Great clean sound
customer_reviews.text: I took this to Greece with me for 3 months this summer and the battery life is awesome. Over 5 hours every day at the beach playing non stop and it still had juice when I brought it home to play while getting ready. I charged it daily. Super clear sound and volume. I was pleasantly surprised how great this little sucker sounded. JBL makes quality products.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for this price point
customer_reviews.text: for $30 I had to get this. I've been wanting a portable Bluetooth speaker for a while, and I'm very happy I went ahead with this! Sound quality is similar to a google home mini, maybe a little better. JBL knows what they are doing, haha. Gets to a nice volume, I was able to use it outside without any volume problems. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Little
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family has their own! The sound is great but designed more for a small space or as a personal sound system. My son uses his in the shower and it does great with the water. The clip makes it portable and easy to find in your bag. We have the old JBL Flip that is several years old and still kicking- hoping these speakers will too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charging Inlet Fails
customer_reviews.text: This is my second JBL Clip (and I also have a friend who is on his second one) where the charging inlet port connection develops a failure. These are portable units that should stand up to the jostling that comes with a being handled frequently, including charging while in use. The design of the charging port is a complete designing cop-out...no different than any other charging inlet used for units that are not designed to be handled while charging.
customer_reviews.author: BMA

customer_reviews.title: I like everything but the clip
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted a small portable speaker to replace a previous version of this JBL one. The clip is a pain and I like everything about the speaker except that. Battery life has improved to 10 hrs over 5 for the previous version, but the speaker is accordingly larger and heavier to accommodate a bigger battery. Use: carry it around the house to play tunes from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: (Insert Name Here)

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker for camping or just tossing in a bag just incase you need to share some music. Its not the loudest but its a small speaker after all. JBL quality sound which always outperforms most others if not all in the price range. The clip seems well constructed so shouldn’t have an issue with that breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my niece for her birthday, but
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was so cool, I purchased one for myself! easy to take with, and has good sound for a speaker that size. I have other portable bluetooth JBL speakers (Charge 3) so I know the sound quality would be there. I take this with me because of it's compact size. I know my niece will love it too! I also like the fact it comes in a large array of colors. :-)
customer_reviews.author: T

The clip 3 is IPX7 waterproof and offers 10 hours of playtime, powered by a 1000mAh rechargeable li-ion battery, allowing you to bring your music with you.
